attrib:
DURATION: 30 / 30 / 30 / 30
BONUS INCOMING DAMAGE: 500% / 400% / 300% / 200%
ILLUSION DAMAGE: 20% / 25% / 30% / 35%
cmb:
MANA COST: 70/80/90/100
COOLDOWN: 40
desc: Creates three images of Naga Siren under her control.
notes:
Naga Siren is invulnerable for 0.3 seconds when casting, allowing her to dodge stuns and damage.
Upon casting, most effects are removed from Naga Siren.
lore: Slithice, while being strong in her own right, is notoriously hard to track down.
name: naga_siren_mirror_image

cmb:
MANA COST: 90/100/110/120
COOLDOWN: 14
desc: Interrupts the target and traps them in place, preventing movement or blinking.
notes:
Works on magic immune units.
Becoming ethereal removes Ensnare.
lore: The only way to escape the onslaught of a Slithereen is to never oppose one in the first place.
name: naga_siren_ensnare

cmb:
MANA COST: 80/90/100/110
COOLDOWN: 10
desc: The Naga Siren and her images hit all nearby units with a damaging wave of water that lowers armor for 8 seconds.
notes: Naga's illusions will also cast Riptide, but enemies in multiple areas of effect will only be hit once.
lore: A torrent from the Deep Ones crushes the defenses of the Siren's enemies.
name: naga_siren_rip_tide

cmb:
MANA COST: 100/100/100
COOLDOWN: 180/120/60
desc: All enemies in range of the Naga Siren are put into a magical stasis where they cannot act or be attacked. Using Song of the Siren again will end the duration early.
notes:
Units affected by Song of the Siren are invulnerable and cannot take damage from any source.
Doesn't affect magic immune units.
The area of the song follows Naga, so if she moves far enough away from affected units, they will wake up.
lore: Slithice's powerful voice enchants leagues of opponents, while calling her Slithereen kin in a time of need.
name: naga_siren_song_of_the_siren

cmb: COOLDOWN: 1
desc: Release enemy units from your song so they can be targeted again.
name: naga_siren_song_of_the_siren_cancel
